@AmyHigel I think we should be teaching our kids how to handle situations like this, to take suicide threats seriously, but we don't need a TV show glamorizing the attention a girl will get after she kills herself. It's sick. Just my opinion.

@AmyHigel I don't think adolescent minds should be watching a teenage girl commit suicide. It can actually trigger people who are already suicidal into doing it, lots of experts say it. It affects different people in different ways. Glad it was positive for your family.
Dunkin' Donuts jumping on the gimmick drink bandwagon.. Trying to give Starbucks a run for their money with a Pop Rocks Comet Donut and Cosmic Coolatta.

My 14-year-old will NOT be watching. Where do we draw the line between awareness/support and glorification of a serious problem? Lots of experts criticized the first season. Parents be aware of how this can impact teenage minds. https://t.co/1yxDW7mlzi
